Title: Episode 765: That Ship Sailed.. and Sank
Description:
This week Jonathan Bennett and Aaron Newcomb talk with Randal Schwartz, the longest running host of FLOSS Weekly, Perl's biggest Cheerleader (well, second to Larry Wall) , and now Dart and Flutter expert. What's new with Randal since his last FLOSS Weekly episode in May 2020? Why should you look at Dart and Flutter? And how do you avoid becoming a security martyr? Learn this and more on this week's FLOSS Weekly!

 

You can join the conversation in the Hackaday Discord, where the show records live each week. 

Theme music: "Newer Wave" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
